thread.title: Binky Felstead shares picture of her bare baby bump -"My little summer baby brewing"
thread.title_full: Binky Felstead shares picture of her bare baby bump -"My little summer baby brewing"

author: Hayley Minn
title: Binky Felstead shares picture of her bare baby bump -"My little summer baby brewing"
text:
Binky shows off her growing belly (Photo: Instagram) Share Get celebs   Could   
Binky Felstead has shared the first picture of her bare baby bump. 
The Made In Chelsea star took to social media ahead of the weekend to show off her growing belly as she poses in the mirror. 
"My little summer baby brewing #thebump ," she wrote. https://www.instagram.com/p/BPf4gd5BEfs/?taken-by=binkyfelstead&hl=en/embed 
Days before, Binky said her her pregnancy was "the best surprise". 
And, referencing her and Made In Chelsea on-off boyfriend Josh 'JP' Patterson's pet names for each other, Binky tweeted: "When you get the best surprise you never knew you always wanted ... There's a little 'buh' on the way." 
She added a snap of her and JP posing with her baby bump. Read More Binky Felstead pregnant with Josh 'JP' Patterson's baby - but they're still not officially a couple 
The reality TV stars recently announced the happy news in Hello! magazine , saying: "It’s obviously been a huge shock to both of us. 
“This is a new start and a new chapter in our lives. I want to be a little family, to be honest. But I'm going to be okay either way. 
“Whatever happens, this baby is not going to be affected. And I know Josh will be part of the baby’s life whether we are together or not. We are a unit now." Read More Made In Chelsea's Ollie Locke launching gay dating app to rival Grindr so he can find perfect man 
And JP went on to add the couple are taking everything slowly when it comes to their future - despite having a baby on the way. 
He said: "Where we're both being very mature is with the fact that you should never get back together just because there's a baby in the picture. It has to be for the right reasons. 
"We love each other a great deal, and there's no pressure – but you do have to take the past into consideration, where there have been a few hiccups. 
"We're just taking it very easy." Like us on Facebook
